channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Microwave dumped in alleyway, access to main road, 25th April
item.description:
Someone has dumped and trashed a microwave in the alleyway from coriander drive and wisteria Way to the main road. Noticed today, not sure how long it's been there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Parklands Cheltenham Road East, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste bin is close to overflowing, 25th April
item.description:
This bin is usually emptied regularly, but it appears to have been missed. It is predominantly used for dog bag waste and needs emptying

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Bramble Cottage Stantons Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Danger to life, 24th April
item.description:
This section of the road is unbelievably bad. The botched repairs continue to degrade. The homes are dangerously deep and cause swerving into on coming traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Greenway Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven road surface, 23rd April
item.description:
Hungerford street is a very uneven road due to historic road works which have caused the road surface to sink. There is also a increasing number of potholes in the road surface as well.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Courtenay Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes along stretch of road, 23rd April
item.description:
Reported previously and informed no fault. Been past tonight and by the slow sign on road coming down from birdlip definitely needs repair Plus there are several others along whole road that need to be assessed. Would be good if your assessor did a thorough job and not a half hearted one as not only damaging to tyres but have to swerve to avoid some and dangerous for bikes and motorcycles
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): B4070, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose man hole cover, 23rd April
item.description:
Loose man hole cover outside 17 hanover street. Causes a banging noise when people walk over it which upsets residential dogs at number 17.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Hanover Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes still exist on roundabout, 23rd April
item.description:
Clearly the person who looks at whether potholes need repairing only does minimum job. Reported that there are several on this roundabout, and great that two or three repaired. But send the person back out to do a decent assessment and get them back to finish of the job properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Barnett Way, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ruined road verge, 23rd April
item.description:
Outside 88 Lansdown Road, GL51 6QR (A40) CBC planning ref. 21/02526/FUL Outside building site (hoardings to site visible in attached photo) - verge has been ruined by builders vehicles parking on it. Deep ruts, sea of mud. Verge on opposite side of road also damaged to lesser extent also by builders vehicles. Highways and/or CBC need to ensure the developer makes good the damage they have caused.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 88 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
